methods.name: pactus.transaction.get_transaction
methods.description: GetTransaction retrieves transaction details based on the provided request parameters.

params.name: id
params.description: The unique ID of the transaction to retrieve.

params.name: verbosity
params.description: The verbosity level for transaction details.

methods.name: pactus.transaction.calculate_fee
methods.description: CalculateFee calculates the transaction fee based on the specified amount and payload type.

params.name: amount
params.description: The amount involved in the transaction, specified in NanoPAC.

params.name: payload_type
params.description: The type of transaction payload.

params.name: fixed_amount
params.description: Indicates if the amount should be fixed and include the fee.

methods.name: pactus.transaction.broadcast_transaction
methods.description: BroadcastTransaction broadcasts a signed transaction to the network.

params.name: signed_raw_transaction
params.description: The signed raw transaction data to be broadcasted.

methods.name: pactus.transaction.get_raw_transfer_transaction
methods.description: GetRawTransferTransaction retrieves raw details of a transfer transaction.

params.name: lock_time
params.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

params.name: sender
params.description: The sender's account address.

params.name: receiver
params.description: The receiver's account address.

params.name: amount
params.description: The amount to be transferred, specified in NanoPAC. Must be greater than 0.

params.name: fee
params.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

params.name: memo
params.description: A memo string for the transaction.

methods.name: pactus.transaction.get_raw_bond_transaction
methods.description: GetRawBondTransaction retrieves raw details of a bond transaction.

params.name: lock_time
params.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

params.name: sender
params.description: The sender's account address.

params.name: receiver
params.description: The receiver's validator address.

params.name: stake
params.description: The stake amount in NanoPAC. Must be greater than 0.

params.name: public_key
params.description: The public key of the validator. Optional, but required when registering a new validator.

params.name: fee
params.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

params.name: memo
params.description: A memo string for the transaction.

methods.name: pactus.transaction.get_raw_unbond_transaction
methods.description: GetRawUnbondTransaction retrieves raw details of an unbond transaction.

params.name: lock_time
params.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

params.name: validator_address
params.description: The address of the validator to unbond from.

params.name: memo
params.description: A memo string for the transaction.

methods.name: pactus.transaction.get_raw_withdraw_transaction
methods.description: GetRawWithdrawTransaction retrieves raw details of a withdraw transaction.

params.name: lock_time
params.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

params.name: validator_address
params.description: The address of the validator to withdraw from.

params.name: account_address
params.description: The address of the account to withdraw to.

params.name: amount
params.description: The withdrawal amount in NanoPAC. Must be greater than 0.

params.name: fee
params.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

params.name: memo
params.description: A memo string for the transaction.

methods.name: pactus.transaction.get_raw_batch_transfer_transaction
methods.description: GetRawBatchTransferTransaction retrieves raw details of batch transfer transaction.

params.name: lock_time
params.description: The lock time for the transaction. If not set, defaults to the last block height.

params.name: sender
params.description: The sender's account address.

params.name: recipients
params.description: The list of recipients with their amounts. Minimum 2 recipients required.

params.name: fee
params.description: The transaction fee in NanoPAC. If not set, it is set to the estimated fee.

params.name: memo
params.description: A memo string for the transaction.

methods.name: pactus.transaction.decode_raw_transaction
methods.description: DecodeRawTransaction accepts raw transaction and returns decoded transaction.

params.name: raw_transaction
params.description: The raw transaction data in hexadecimal format.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_block
methods.description: GetBlock retrieves information about a block based on the provided request parameters.

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the block to retrieve.

params.name: verbosity
params.description: The verbosity level for block information.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_block_hash
methods.description: GetBlockHash retrieves the hash of a block at the specified height.

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the block to retrieve the hash for.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_block_height
methods.description: GetBlockHeight retrieves the height of a block with the specified hash.

params.name: hash
params.description: The hash of the block to retrieve the height for.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_blockchain_info
methods.description: GetBlockchainInfo retrieves general information about the blockchain.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_committee_info
methods.description: GetCommitteeInfo retrieves information about the current committee.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_consensus_info
methods.description: GetConsensusInfo retrieves information about the consensus instances.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_account
methods.description: GetAccount retrieves information about an account based on the provided address.

params.name: address
params.description: The address of the account to retrieve information for.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_validator
methods.description: GetValidator retrieves information about a validator based on the provided address.

params.name: address
params.description: The address of the validator to retrieve information for.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_validator_by_number
methods.description: GetValidatorByNumber retrieves information about a validator based on the provided number.

params.name: number
params.description: The unique number of the validator to retrieve information for.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_validator_addresses
methods.description: GetValidatorAddresses retrieves a list of all validator addresses.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_public_key
methods.description: GetPublicKey retrieves the public key of an account based on the provided address.

params.name: address
params.description: The address for which to retrieve the public key.

methods.name: pactus.blockchain.get_tx_pool_content
methods.description: GetTxPoolContent retrieves current transactions in the transaction pool.

params.name: payload_type
params.description: The type of transactions to retrieve from the transaction pool. 0 means all types.

methods.name: pactus.network.get_network_info
methods.description: GetNetworkInfo retrieves information about the overall network.

methods.name: pactus.network.list_peers
methods.description: ListPeers lists all peers in the network.

params.name: include_disconnected
params.description: If true, includes disconnected peers (default: connected peers only).

methods.name: pactus.network.get_node_info
methods.description: GetNodeInfo retrieves information about a specific node in the network.

methods.name: pactus.network.ping
methods.description: Ping provides a simple connectivity test and latency measurement.

methods.name: pactus.utils.sign_message_with_private_key
methods.description: SignMessageWithPrivateKey signs a message with the provided private key.

params.name: private_key
params.description: The private key to sign the message.

params.name: message
params.description: The message content to be signed.

methods.name: pactus.utils.verify_message
methods.description: VerifyMessage verifies a signature against the public key and message.

params.name: message
params.description: The original message content that was signed.

params.name: signature
params.description: The signature to verify in hexadecimal format.

params.name: public_key
params.description: The public key of the signer.

methods.name: pactus.utils.public_key_aggregation
methods.description: PublicKeyAggregation aggregates multiple BLS public keys into a single key.

params.name: public_keys
params.description: List of BLS public keys to be aggregated.

methods.name: pactus.utils.signature_aggregation
methods.description: SignatureAggregation aggregates multiple BLS signatures into a single signature.

params.name: signatures
params.description: List of BLS signatures to be aggregated.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.create_wallet
methods.description: CreateWallet creates a new wallet with the specified parameters.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name for the new wallet.

params.name: password
params.description: Password to secure the new wallet.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.restore_wallet
methods.description: RestoreWallet restores an existing wallet with the given mnemonic.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name for the restored wallet.

params.name: mnemonic
params.description: The mnemonic (seed phrase) for wallet recovery.

params.name: password
params.description: Password to secure the restored wallet.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.load_wallet
methods.description: LoadWallet loads an existing wallet with the given name. deprecated: It will be removed in a future version.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to load.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.unload_wallet
methods.description: UnloadWallet unloads a currently loaded wallet with the specified name. deprecated: It will be removed in a future version.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to unload.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.list_wallets
methods.description: ListWallets returns a list of all available wallets.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.get_wallet_info
methods.description: GetWalletInfo returns detailed information about a specific wallet.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to query.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.update_password
methods.description: UpdatePassword updates the password of an existing wallet.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet whose password will be updated.

params.name: old_password
params.description: The current wallet password.

params.name: new_password
params.description: The new wallet password.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.get_total_balance
methods.description: GetTotalBalance returns the total available balance of the wallet.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to get the total balance.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.get_total_stake
methods.description: GetTotalStake returns the total stake amount in the wallet.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to get the total stake.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.get_validator_address
methods.description: GetValidatorAddress retrieves the validator address associated with a public key. Deprecated: Will move into utils.

params.name: public_key
params.description: The public key of the validator.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.get_address_info
methods.description: GetAddressInfo returns detailed information about a specific address.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet containing the address.

params.name: address
params.description: The address to query.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.set_address_label
methods.description: SetAddressLabel sets or updates the label for a given address.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet containing the address.

params.name: password
params.description: Wallet password required for modification.

params.name: address
params.description: The address to label.

params.name: label
params.description: The new label for the address.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.get_new_address
methods.description: GetNewAddress generates a new address for the specified wallet.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to generate a new address.

params.name: address_type
params.description: The type of address to generate.

params.name: label
params.description: A label for the new address.

params.name: password
params.description: Password for the new address. It's required when address_type is Ed25519 type.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.list_addresses
methods.description: ListAddresses returns all addresses in the specified wallet.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the queried wallet.

params.name: address_types
params.description: Filter addresses by their types. If empty, all address types are included.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.sign_message
methods.description: SignMessage signs an arbitrary message using a wallet's private key.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to sign with.

params.name: password
params.description: Wallet password required for signing.

params.name: address
params.description: The address whose private key should be used for signing the message.

params.name: message
params.description: The arbitrary message to be signed.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.sign_raw_transaction
methods.description: SignRawTransaction signs a raw transaction for a specified wallet.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet used for signing.

params.name: raw_transaction
params.description: The raw transaction data to be signed.

params.name: password
params.description: Wallet password required for signing.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.list_transactions
methods.description: ListTransactions returns a list of transactions for a wallet, optionally filtered by a specific address, with pagination support.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to query transactions for.

params.name: address
params.description: Optional: The address to filter transactions. If empty or set to '*', transactions for all addresses in the wallet are included.

params.name: direction
params.description: Filter transactions by direction relative to the wallet. Defaults to any direction if not set.

params.name: count
params.description: Optional: The maximum number of transactions to return. Defaults to 10 if not set.

params.name: skip
params.description: Optional: The number of transactions to skip (for pagination). Defaults to 0 if not set.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.set_default_fee
methods.description: SetDefaultFee sets the default fee for the wallet.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to set the default fee.

params.name: amount
params.description: The default fee amount in NanoPAC.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.get_mnemonic
methods.description: GetMnemonic returns the mnemonic (seed phrase) for the wallet.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet to get the mnemonic.

params.name: password
params.description: Wallet password.

methods.name: pactus.wallet.get_private_key
methods.description: GetPrivateKey returns the private key for a given address.

params.name: wallet_name
params.description: The name of the wallet containing the address.

params.name: password
params.description: Wallet password.

params.name: address
params.description: The address to get the private key.
